content: Hello. Did not find any API to get list of topics muted by the user for a stream. Any help is appreciated.
@Shirish I don't think we have a dedicated API endpoint for that. You can get the data from https://zulip.com/api/register-queue; search for muted_topics for the details.

Can you talk a bit about your use case? It would be easy to add an API endpoint around this, but I'm not aware of significant use cases for wanting muted topics without wanting a bunch of data such that a /register request would be a convenient way to get what you need.

@Tim Abbott Thanks for the guidenace on register-queue API. My use case => Create a private notification channel between particiapnt and an advisor bot. The bot would periodically send personalized messages to pre-defined set of topics. User can opt out (mute) from topic and bot can check if topic is muted then it will no send communicaiton.
Ok that bot will probably need a queue in order to work anyway.
